about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Autumn 2022] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Caramel Patterned Floor
  • Marquee Striped Wall
  • Accent Wall Plates
  • Rustic Hive Lights
  • Marquee Table Set
  • Table Persimmon Vase

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
